version_description:
Tired of audiobook issues while driving and frequently losing your place or restarting?
Annoyed that your downloaded video won't play offline?
Wondering why AirPlay through Apple TV wasn't a great experience?
Update to iOS 10 and this latest app and check out our new players, complete with native AirPlay support (no mirroring required)!
Fixes app crashing on devices running iOS 9.

• We made sure to delete your downloaded content after being returned. We know storage space is a valuable thing so we fixed the issue.
• We allow rotating comics in Action View again. We understand how annoying that was and won't let it happen again.
• We [connection error] cleaned up “connection errors,” so they [connection error] aren't cluttering up [connection error] your screen.
• We fixed issues where genres were crashing the app. Feel free to browse again without interruptions.
• We added a skip backward/forward feature in audiobooks. Should make it much easier to skip back or ahead.
• We fixed the audio mini-player so it doesn't block anything.

• We fixed the variable speed playback bug that was resetting your speed on every pause. While it was kind of fun to cycle back through each time, we figured we should fix that.
• We reworked the logout button so it actually logs you out. Buttons can be difficult sometimes.
• On a serious note, we added a dyslexic font to our ebooks.

• Minor bug fixes
• Fixed several issues on devices running iOS 9

• Downloads ARE NOW being deleted when a title returns. For real this time. Transitioning between net……works should be a much……better experience. Seriously, the pausing should no longer happen every time you pass a cell tower.

• We fixed several audiobook playback position bugs. We still recommend downloading your audiobook, but you shouldn't lose your place like before.

• When you press play on an audiobook or music CD, the player will now be full screen. If you couldn't find your player controls before, it should be much easier now.
• We fixed the issues where music was stopping while your screen was locked. This should make listening to music better, because you will be actually listening to music instead of not listening to music.

• No more login issues! Once you enter your credentials, just tap LOGIN or SEND on the keyboard. No more dismissing the keyboard to login!
• We added cover art to the lock screen. It looks way cooler with pictures!
• We added the ability to rate titles. You can finally give Birdemic 2 a 5-star review!
• We added the ability to report an error on the title details. You no longer have to access the share button to report a title error!
• eBook fix for devices running iOS 11

• Added support for the iPhone X. We wanted hoopla to match its elegance. Apparently with elegance, eBooks work better too.
• Added 2x playback speed for audiobooks. Listen faster. Did we say faster? Everyone likes fast.
• Added the ability to close the audio mini player. When you're done listening to music or audiobooks, just hit the x and browse away with no impediments. Yay freedom.
• Fixed the RETURN NOW button so when you click it, the button changes. Yeah, we think it’s cool too.
• Titles will now play all the time when re-borrowed, and not only when Jupiter is in perfect alignment. Because nothing is perfect, but things can actually work.
• No longer allowing video downloads on devices running iOS 9. You can still stream video all day long, so never fear.

Are you still reading this? If so, we thank you for spending time to see what we worked on, and thank you for using hoopla.
